sources.name: Causes of child mortality – IHME Global Burden of Disease study
sources.description:
Data published by Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME)
Data publisher's source Global Burden of Disease study
Link http://www.healthdata.org/data-visualization/gbd-compare
Retrieved 2017-02-14

Estimates refer to both sexes and to the global level.

All causes for which IHME published an estimate of 0 were removed from the dataset.

Ebola as a cause of death was only included in 2015 by IHME. We have assumed 0 deaths for Ebola in 1990.

variables.name: Share of children dying in first 5 years globally, by cause
